publishedfiledetails.title: More Narcotics & More Tranq-Arrows Combined v3.0
publishedfiledetails.description:
I have released this mod in Verison 2.1 in a legacy edition.

So, if you liked this mod prior to the new changes i made in v3.0 here it is.

Link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1449245048

----

If you have trouble crafting some arrows, try this:

Unsubscribe from this mod, delete the mod in your "mods" folder and re-subscribe.
Also make sure you don't have any INI-settings set witch conflicts with the new crafting order!

Be aware that there is a new crafting order for narcotis now !!!!!!

------

Hi everyone, 

i created this mod cause many people asked me to combine my two mods together. 
So here it is:


Facts: 

Adds 5 new tranq arrows and 5 new narcotics. 

All arrows can be fired by bow, crossbow and now by compund bow. 
Only the torpor is increased, the damage dealt to creatures is the same as for a normal tranq arrow. 



Blue: 10 Times more effective than the normal green ones. 
Purple: 50 Times more effective than the normal green ones. 
Yellow: 100 Times more effective than the normal green ones. 
Red: 200 Times more effective than the normal green ones.
Black: 500  Times more effective than the normal green ones.

Counts for both, the arrows and the narcotics.



Blue narcotic adds 400 Torpor over 8 sec. 
Purple narcotic adds 2000 Torpor over 8 sec. 
Yellow narcotic adds 4000 Torpor over 8 sec. 
Red narcotic adds 8000 Torpor over 8 sec.
Black narcotic adds 20000 Torpor over 8 sec.  



Crafting Requirements - arrows: 

Blue arrow: 1 Stonearrow & 1 blue narcotic | Level 35 
Purple arrow: 1 Stonearrow & 1 purple narcotic | Level 50 
Yellow arrow: 1 Stonearrow & 1 yellow narcotic | Level 65 
Red arrow: 1 Stonearrow & 1 red narcotic | Level 80 
Black arrow: 1 Stonearrow & 1 black narcotic | Level 95



Crafting Requirements - narcotics (!CHANGED!):

Blue narcotic: 10 green narcotics | Level 35 
Purple narcotic: 5 blue narcotics | Level 50 
Yellow narcotic: 2 purple narcotics | Level 65 
Red narcotic: 2 yellow narcotics | Level 80 
Black narcotic: 5 yellow narcotics | Level 95



Spawn - narcotics:

Blue narcotic:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x10/PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x10.PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x10'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 460 

Purple narcotic:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x50/PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x50.PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x50'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 461 

Yellow narcotic:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x100/PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x100.PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x100'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 462 

Red narcotic:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x200/PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x200.PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x200'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 463

Black narcotic:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x500/PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x500.PrimalItemConsumable_Narcotic-x500'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 464


Spawn - arrows:

Blue arrow:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x10/PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x10.PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x10'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 465 

Purple arrow:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x50/PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x50.PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x50'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 466 

Yellow arrow:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x100/PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x100.PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x100'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 467 

Red arrow:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x200/PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x200.PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x200'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 468

Black arrow:
giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/754885087/x500/PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x500.PrimalItemAmmo_Tranq-Arrow-x500'" 1 0 0

Item-ID: 469



ModID: 754885087

A Great THANKS goes out to Gonzo - he provided me some recolored ingame textures.
